name: CPD Zone 2 - District 19
description: 19th District - Town Hall: Serving Uptown, south Lincoln Square, North Center, and Lakeview (including Boystown).

name: CPD Zone 3 - Districts 12 and 14
description: Near West Side, Wicker Park, Ukranian Village, West Town, Logan Square, Bucktown, UIC areas.

name: CPD Zone 4 - Districts 1 and 18
description: 1st District-Central..18th District-Near North.. Zone cover Downtown Chicago, Lake Shore Drive, Mag Mile, Navy Pier, Central Detention

name: CPD Zone 5 - District 2
description: 2nd District - Wentworth: Serving Douglas, Oakland, Grand Boulevard, Kenwood, Washington Park, and Hyde Park.

name: CPD Zone 9 - Districts 5 and 22
description: 5th District.. Calumet / Area South.. 22nd District  Morgan Park

name: CPD Zone 10 - Districts 10 and 11
description: 10th District - Ogden: Serving North Lawndale, South Lawndale, and the Lower West Side; 11th District - Harrison: Serving West Garfield Park, East Garfield Park, and the southern half of Humboldt Park.

name: CPD Zone 11 - Districts 20 and 24
description: Dist. 20 and 24, serving the far North side of Chicago, including community areas of Rodgers Park, West Ridge, and Edgewater

name: CPD Zone 12 - Districts 15 and 25
description: Dist. 15 and 25, serving the far West side of Chicago, including community areas of Austin, Hermosa, and Belmont Cragin.

name: CPD Zone 13 - District 9
description: 9th District - Deering: Serving Bridgeport, McKinley Park, Brighton Park, New City, and Gage Park.
